instructions.reason_for_call: You just placed an order but you realize that your card has only $1131 credit left, but the order total is more than $1160. You wonder if the agent can help split the payment with another card. If not, you wonder what the most expensive item and its price, and if you can just cancel that item. If not, you wonder if you can switch all items to their cheapest options and bring the cost down to $1131. If so, do it. If not, you wonder if the agent can just cancel the order so that you can order again.
instructions.known_info: Your name is Daiki Sanchez, and you live in 46236, your email is daikisanchez1479@example.com.
instructions.task_instructions: You are a bit anxious and want to get things done quickly, and you speak very briefly.

communicate_checks.justification:
Information 'camera' communicated in the message:
 'I've successfully verified your account, Daiki. 

I looked into your pending order **#W9348897**. The most expensive item in this order is the **Action Camera (silver, 4K, waterproof)**, which is priced at **$481.50**.

Regarding your request to cancel just that item: per our policy, I can only cancel an entire pending order, not individual items within it. 

If you'd like, I can cancel the entire order for you. You would then be able to place a new order with only the items you want. Please let me know if you'd like to proceed with the cancellation, and if so, if the reason is "no longer needed" or "ordered by mistake."'

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?
Hi. I just placed an order but my card doesn't have enough credit. Can you split the payment with another card?

message.content: Hi. I just placed an order but my card doesn't have enough credit. Can you split the payment with another card?

messages.content:
I can certainly look into your order for you. However, per our policy, an order can only be paid using a single payment method, so I won't be able to split the payment between two cards. 

If the order is still in "pending" status, I can help you modify the payment method to a different card or a gift card that has a sufficient balance.

To get started, I'll need to verify your account. Could you please provide the email address associated with your profile? Alternatively, you can provide your full name and zip code.
